text: @maggieNYT Where was the media on this? The media was pumping out articles telling people the Coronavirus was not a threat, and that the China travel ban was racist. Media failed. De Blasio/Pelosi encouraged people to go to Chinatown, bars, restaurants until March. Dems Failed.
